channel.title: Virtual environment on CloudBuff
channel.description: Recent content in Virtual environment on CloudBuff

item.title: Virtual Environment in Ubuntu
item.description: Setting up Virtual environment in ubuntu (Probably the best way) Setting up virtual environment using virtual-environment-wrapper Pre-requisites : Python3 pip3 Install the ‘virtualenvwrapper’ using pip3: pip url : https://pypi.org/project/virtualenvwrapper/ ~:$ pip3 install virtualenvwrapper Then find the location of the python executables ~:$ which python3 /usr/bin/python3 Then add the following lines to ‘.bashrc’ file These set the following locations where the virtual environments should live, the location of the script installed by virtualenvwrapper export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.

item.title: Virtual Environment in Ubuntu
item.description: Setting up Virtual environment in ubuntu (Probably the best way) Setting up virtual environment using virtual-environment-wrapper Pre-requisites : Python3 pip3 Install the ‘virtualenvwrapper’ using pip3: pip url : https://pypi.org/project/virtualenvwrapper/ ~:$ pip3 install virtualenvwrapper Then find the location of the python executables ~:$ which python3 /usr/bin/python3 Then add the following lines to ‘.bashrc’ file These set the following locations where the virtual environments should live, the location of the script installed by virtualenvwrapper export WORKON_HOME=$HOME/.
